description: This sport coat merges a lightweight construction inspired by shirt jackets with a cricket-stripe twill fabric from England.
fitting_details: Size 40R has a 30" front body length, a 29½" back body length, an 18½" shoulder, and a 17½" sleeve inseam.
Notch lapels. Buttonhole at the left lapel. Three-button silhouette.
Left chest patch pocket. Two front waist patch pockets. Two interior chest pockets. Interior left waist pocket.
Alterations available in Ralph Lauren retail stores.
Shell: wool. Body lining: polyester. Sleeve lining: viscose, acetate. Dry clean. Made in Italy.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size 40R.
